---
title: planet
date: 2020-01-01
---

An R package for all of the bioinformatic tools I created from my PhD. They all use epigenetic patterns to predict: cell composition, ethnicity, age, and disease (preeclampsia), all from using placental DNA methylation data as input. 

- [planet R package](https://victoryuan.com/planet/)
- [source](https://github.com/wvictor14/planet)
